name: 2D Galaxy Shooter (ChrisHilton)
description:
Hello and Welcome to this 2D Galaxy Shooter adventure!

This is the first game I have made and I had an absolute blast making this. I certainly hope you enjoy it and if you encounter any bugs or issues please feel free to reach out to me so I can fix them.

Within this adventure you are tasked with destroying all the incoming space enemies over a series of 5 waves. Once the final enemy has been spawned in wave 5 the Final Boss wave will start! This boss fight is not as straight forward as it may seem =)

V1.0 - Initial upload
